final_project.tasks package¶

Submodules¶

final_project.tasks.tasks module¶

Module which performs ETL on OWID Covid 19 data.

class final_project.tasks.tasks.AggregateWeeklyData(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: sphinx.ext.autodoc.importer._MockObject

Luigi task which aggregates covid daily stats by week.

other¶

Used by autodoc_mock_imports.

output()¶

Specifies the LocalTarget output for the task

parent_directory¶

Used by autodoc_mock_imports.

requires¶

Used by autodoc_mock_imports.

run()¶

Aggregates case volume, stringency index and additional stats by country and week. Writes the results to data/weekly_data.csv
